items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable, Easy-care Housedress/Gown
items.body: Tried and returned a few other house dresses/gowns because I found the fit across the shoulders too close--those gowns were 80% polyester/20% spandex and the inside neckline was faced with the same fabric and felt "grabby" on my skin; this one's 15% cotton and 5% spandex to 80% polyester is smooth, slides across the skin, has a nice stretch and even feels cooler. I am 5'3", 225 lbs. and carry weight around the middle--I ordered the 3X; the top fits with ease across the shoulders without the rest of the dress being too voluminous (if you're "hippy," there's plenty of skirt). The hem is about 4" below the bottom of my knee and hits mid-calf (I can bend over without revealing anything). Very easy care--just washed on tap-cool, hung in front of a tabletop fan and it was dry in less than 30 minutes. I also like that the bodice opens/closes (has three buttons) which makes it easy to pull over the head without disturbing my hair, or even makeup if I'm wearing this during the day as a housedress. I chose the cyan (it's a deep teal blue with white/pink paisleys and stylized tulips on the background)--it is NOT at all see-through and does not cling. Although I would not wear this out and about, I can wear this when I retrieve mail and packages from the porch, or bring the garbage bins out at the curb back up to the house on trash pickup day, or have family/friends come by for a visit. EDIT 6/13/25--Liked the first one so much, I bought another in the green (it's a bright turquoise) flower. It's great to sleep in--doesn't get too hot, slides easily on the sheets without tumping you on the floor, fabric's soft and you're not a wrinkled mess if you get up and wear it the rest of the day. UPDATE 6/22/25--I just ordered/received two more housedress/gowns and this time, each gown in its zipper packaging was vacuum-sealed into a heavier plastic bag. This gave more protection while being shipped (they were like two boards!), but it really wrinkled them. They don't look like a slept-in bed after their initial wash, but it may take another washing, or two, for all the wrinkles to really fall out as I don't use the dryer, I hang-dry. Read more
items.author: Texas Duchess

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable and each one was beautiful! I felt dressed up even though I wore them at home.
items.body: I ordered three and I was very pleased with the fit, the material was beautiful and so soft. They are not see through and they were made very well. Read more
items.author: Phyllis High

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Girl it has pockets
items.body: If you are looking for fashion and comfort this is it. The fabric is amazing so soft and beautiful and beyond comfortable. And with so many different colors it is easy to be pleased. Can you best the price? No nowhere I know of. I will be buying again as I need more of this kind of softness. And Girl it has pockets!!!! Read more
items.author: Bubba

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable House Dress
items.body: House dress fits exactly as pictured & true to size. I am 5’9”, 180 lbs; ordered XL. The length comes below my knees and very roomy. Material is soft and colorful. Worth the price. Comfortable for relaxing day at home. I ordered a second one. Read more
items.author: noreen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good first impression
items.body: When I'm home all day and not expecting guests my preferred lounge wear is no bra/no panties and extra roomy (I like to go up one size) light weight nightgowns/moo moos/house dresses like these. Nice soft and slightly stretchy material, not too thin, hangs nice, has pockets. 50% cheaper than ones I paid for on Etsy which weren't as nice as these. Ordering another one. Hopefully they don't pill or wear out fast but I line dry my nightgowns and robes which makes them last alot longer. Edited to add...I placed a 2nd order for "fan shaped" and the color is inaccurate. Instead of the feature color of a lighter blue and light tan color as seen in this pic, the one I received is royal blue and orange. Not particularly fond of the color but not returning since it's just something I wear around the house. So be aware colors might vary on some of the options. Read more
items.author: BethanyBT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and fit
items.body: Love this dress comfortable fabric friendly an the price was goo roomy and true to size Read more
items.author: Auroura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFEECTION!!
items.body: Beautiful fabric and pattern colors . Fits perfectly I even ordered a M when I usually get a L and found it to fit quite well. Machine wash on Cool setting and dried on low heat for very short time. No wrinkles at all!! I would most likely order another for wearing in warmer weather......so much easier to wear when it's HOT. Read more
items.author: Carol D

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Uglier than I expected a mumu to be and SO polyester!
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: It looks great in the pictures but they’re deceiving. People talked about how they were soft.. I guess that’s true but they feel like 100% polyester. I don’t know about other people, but that’s going to make me sweat and itch because this is not fabric that is going to breathe. I can probably wear it in the winter, but there is no way I can wear it in the summertime. Thank goodness they didn’t ship both of the ones I ordered at the same time and I was able to cancel the other one.. I ordered my size. It hangs down almost to my ankles. That’s not what showed in the picture. I thought this would be light and comfortable for summer wearing, but it will not be. Glad it was not expensive. I guess I need to find someplace locally so I can actually check the item out before I buy it because I’m not going to buy any more of these on Amazon. Read more
items.author: Dawn

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cyan, Green Red Flower, Pink Flowers on White, Blue, Apricot, Black, Orange, Blue and White Porcelain, Small Green Flower, Dark Green, Light Blue, Blue Flower, Navy, Wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
